name: DWD Strassenwetterservice Map
author: Yannick Schaus
description: Displays a map with markers from openHAB Location objects positions

settings.label: Center
settings.description: Initial centering of the map

settings.label: Latitude
settings.description: Latitude of the map center point; optional, not used if markers are present

settings.label: Longitude
settings.description: Longitude of the map center point; optional, not used if markers are present

settings.label: Default Zoom Level (max. 19)
settings.description: Default zoom level; the map will also be centered on the markers and zoom accordingly but not beyond this level.

settings.label: Enabled
settings.description: Enable this marker

settings.label: Name
settings.description: Name of Weather Station (will be displayed)

settings.label: openHAB Item
settings.description: Item of type Location (or String with latitude,longitude)

settings.label: Marker icon
settings.description: Glyphicon to use in the marker (without the glyphicon- prefix, examples: star, user), see https://getbootstrap.com/docs/3.3/components/
